content: James McKee - Royal Holloway Research Portal James McKee Professor Discrete Mathematics and its ApplicationsNumber TheoryProfessor of Mathematics, Department of Mathematics Phone+44 1784 443670EmailJames.McKeerhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Research interestsJames McKee’s research interests lie at the interface of number theory and combinatorics, with computational leanings. His recent work has mostly been connected with Pisot numbers, Salem numbers, other algebraic numbers whose Galois conjugates are geometrically constrained, and associating algebraic numbers to certain combinatorial objects.
